title: Information on Node.js
content: It is a way to use JavaScript in the backend of a website.

title: Why React is better than Handlebars
content: React is an easier to use technology with more features. It can be very helpful after someone learns to use it.

title: Using git for version control
content: Git is a very helpful tool to use when programming. It can help you with making different branches and reverting back to older commits.
